item.title: About
item.description: Hello! My name is Matias. I’ve always been interested in tech, tinkering and electronics. This is a place where I ramble about my ongoing projects and tech related stuff that interest me. I’ve never been keen on writing anything, I’m more of a talker. Even writing e-mails feels unnatural to me. I think e-mails should be coherent and clear and with my lacking writing skill it takes way too long to write them.
